                 class="sponsor__image macron"/>

  <div class="contain contain--wide">

    <div class="featured-grid__inner">

      <h2 class="hidden">Featured News</h2>

            <div class="featured-grid__primary-block">

  <div class="js-view-dom-id-dc13f24d900ebb174036a2571cdbf8a3a002e67fc8b64941d19e86eb13e40d63">
  
  
  

  
  
  

      <article class="teaser teaser--related">
  <div class="teaser__inner">
    <h3 class="teaser__heading teaser__heading--related"><a href="/news/a-night-of-woe-for-city-pair" hreflang="en">A Night Of Woe For City Pair</a></h3>
  </div>
</article>

        <a href="/media/17331"><img src="/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/video_thumbnails/0_2fieiu1p.jpg?itok=XmrMsBPn" width="480" height="270" alt="Thumbnail" title="Wimmer On City Switch" typeof="foaf:Image" />

</a>

    </div>
    <div class="teaser__content">
      <p class="teaser__meta"><span class="teaser__category">Interviews</span> <span class="teaser__publish-time">4 days ago</span></p>
      <h3 class="teaser__heading"><a href="/media/17331" hreflang="en">Wimmer On City Switch</a></h3>
    </div>
  </div>
</article>
      <article class="teaser teaser--grid-layout">
  <div class="teaser__inner">

    </div>

</section>
